scripts.scss: node-sass --output-style compressed --quiet --indent-type tab --indent-width 4 -o dist/css src/scss --include-path node_modules/normalize-scss/sass
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons && mkdir -p dist/images && svg-sprite-generate -d src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run -s scss && npm run -s autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run -s lint && npm run -s uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run -s imagemin && npm run -s icons
scripts.build:all: npm run -s build:css && npm run -s build:js && npm run -s build:images
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'src/scss/**/*.scss' -- npm run -s build:css && echo '{{event}} to {{changed}}'
